subject: Vam Pro missing!!!!!
description_text:
Goodmorning, on the 11/12/2025 I ordered Pro x ultra with haptic motors…
today the package was delivered but only the pedals were in the box… the
motors are missing!!!!! I wait for answers. Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Luca Cengia,  Hello, please provide your order number.

#SSN4713

Il giorno lun 22 dic 2025 alle 14:12 support@simsonn.com <
support@simsonn.com> ha scritto:

> Hi Luca Cengia,
>
> Hello, please provide your order number.
>
>
>

Hi Luca Cengia,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Your haptics device has not been shipped from the warehouse. Here is your tracking link. I will urge them to ship it out as soon as possible.    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELV1638142446YQ

Ok thank you so much, (because under the “Delivered” sectuon there were
both tracking numbers I thought that they were supposed to be delivered
toghether.)
I got the pedals working thanks to the Offset advice.
I wait for news on the tracking of haptic motors.
Thank you for the quick response and advices.
Have a good one,
Luca.

Il giorno mar 23 dic 2025 alle 10:53 support@simsonn.com <
support@simsonn.com> ha scritto:

> Hi Luca Cengia,
>
> We apologize for the inconvenience. Your haptics device has not been
> shipped from the warehouse. Here is your tracking link. I will urge them to
> ship it out as soon as possible.
> https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELV1638142446YQ
>
>

Goodmorning Simsonn, my order has been delivered to local courier. Will I
get another tracking number for the courier or I will keep tracking by your
link?

Thank you,
Luca
